title: Blended Assessment and Feedback Design Strategies in Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Language education course for working adult learners. Requires designing a formative feedback system integrating real-time/synchronous and asynchronous assessment methods in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can correct linguistic errors by over 30% using feedback from peers and instructors.
Learners can establish self-directed language learning plans based on structured evaluation rubrics.
Learners can maintain an 80% or higher participation rate in blended assessment environments (synchronous/asynchronous).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
